note.value:
Object is marked with A69306, which is incorrect number [Nick Molteno 25 August 2009]

Expert advice sought in 2018 to inform Medicine Galleries interpretation. Professor Bruce Kapferer (Bergen) and Professor Lionel Bentharage (Columbo) both advised that this was a kolam mask. Bentharage advised that represents the 'mask of the moorman'. [Sarah Bond 08/03/18]
